attributes.action: To make the United Kingdoms careers  have a pay rise!
attributes.additional_details: At least increase careers pay by 10-15% because they work as hard as nurses so but they instead help out the elderly!
attributes.background: To increase careers pay rise because they are constantly underpaid!

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about pay for social care workers are a matter for their employers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
